plot: Comic actress Bridget McManus wants to be famous and will do just about anything to reach her goal. Her level-headed wife, Karman, tries to be supportive, but Bridget has her own (slightly delusional) ideas about how to play the fame game.
plot_en: Comic actress Bridget McManus wants to be famous and will do just about anything to reach her goal. Her level-headed wife, Karman, tries to be supportive, but Bridget has her own (slightly delusional) ideas about how to play the fame game.
plot_es: Comic actress Bridget McManus wants to be famous and will do just about anything to reach her goal. Her level-headed wife, Karman, tries to be supportive, but Bridget has her own (slightly delusional) ideas about how to play the fame game.
title: McManusLand
